emails.subject: California Power Crisis - Urgent Update
emails.body: As you are aware, California is experiencing significant power supply issues. Our trading desk has been actively managing our positions in the western markets. Please refer all media inquiries to our communications team.

emails.subject: RE: Natural Gas Swap Agreement
emails.body: Attached please find the revised swap agreement for your review. The counterparty has agreed to our proposed modifications to the termination clause. Please sign and return by end of week.

emails.subject: Q4 Financial Results Preview
emails.body: Our preliminary Q4 numbers are looking strong. Revenue from wholesale services exceeded projections by 12%. The special purpose entities continue to perform as expected. Full report to follow.

emails.subject: Team lunch Friday
emails.body: Hey everyone! Let's do lunch this Friday at the usual place to celebrate finishing the Q1 planning cycle. My treat. Let me know if you can make it!

emails.subject: West Power Position Update
emails.body: Current west coast power position summary: We are long 500 MW for Feb delivery and have secured additional transmission capacity for March. Market conditions remain favorable for our strategy.

emails.subject: System Maintenance Window - Feb 20
emails.body: Scheduled maintenance on the trading system database will occur Sunday Feb 20 from 2am-6am CST. All systems should be fully operational by market open Monday. Please save all work before leaving Friday.

emails.subject: Forward Contract Documentation
emails.body: Please review the attached forward contract for natural gas delivery. We need confirmation that the force majeure clause adequately protects our interests given recent market volatility.

emails.subject: Meeting Request: Quarterly Review
emails.body: Please block your calendars for the quarterly business review on March 28th. Each division should prepare a 15-minute presentation covering YTD performance and Q2 outlook.

emails.subject: Electricity Price Forecast Model
emails.body: We've updated our electricity price forecast model with the latest weather data and demand projections. The model now predicts higher volatility in April due to expected temperature swings.

emails.subject: Budget Reallocation Request
emails.body: Due to revised revenue projections, we are asking all departments to identify potential cost savings of 5%. Please submit your proposals by April 15th for executive review.

emails.subject: California Regulatory Filing
emails.body: FERC has requested additional documentation regarding our California trading activities. Please compile all relevant records from Q4 2000 and Q1 2001 for submission.

emails.subject: Happy Birthday Mike!
emails.body: Happy birthday! Cake in the break room at 3pm. Don't be late - last time you missed your own party! Hope you have a great day.

emails.subject: Pipeline Capacity Constraints
emails.body: We're seeing significant constraints on the SoCal border. Available capacity has dropped 15% due to maintenance. Recommend hedging physical positions accordingly.

emails.subject: Summer Intern Onboarding
emails.body: Summer interns will arrive June 1st. Please ensure workspace is ready and initial projects are identified. Orientation schedule attached.

emails.subject: Risk Management Report
emails.body: Monthly risk report attached. VaR remains within approved limits. Notable increase in credit exposure to certain California counterparties - recommend monitoring closely.

emails.subject: Power Market Update - 156
emails.body: Latest power market analysis shows continued volatility in the western region. Recommend maintaining current hedge positions until further notice.

emails.subject: Contract Review Required - 892
emails.body: Please review the attached master agreement amendments. Counterparty is requesting modifications to credit support annex.

emails.subject: Team Meeting - 443
emails.body: Scheduling follow-up discussion on Q2 targets. Please confirm your availability for Thursday afternoon.

emails.subject: Gas Trading Summary - 217
emails.body: Daily trading summary attached. Notable activity in the March-April spread. Volume up 20% week over week.

emails.subject: Compliance Update - 334
emails.body: New FERC regulations effective next month. Training sessions being scheduled for all trading personnel.

emails.subject: Project Update - 667
emails.body: Project milestone achieved ahead of schedule. Next phase kickoff meeting scheduled for Monday.

emails.subject: West Coast Position - 512
emails.body: Current western position update: Long 750 MW for October delivery. Transmission secured through November.

emails.subject: Settlement Terms - 289
emails.body: Settlement documentation ready for review. Please confirm terms before end of business Friday.

emails.subject: FYI - 145
emails.body: Sharing update from yesterday's board meeting. Key decisions summarized in attached memo.

emails.subject: Price Alert: California - 778
emails.body: Spot prices in California reached new highs today. Market fundamentals suggest continued upward pressure.

emails.subject: Regulatory Filing - 901
emails.body: Quarterly regulatory filing due next week. Please ensure all documentation is complete and reviewed.

emails.subject: Action Required - 556
emails.body: Year-end audit preparation checklist attached. Please complete your sections by June 15th.

emails.subject: Transmission Rights - 623
emails.body: Transmission rights allocation for Q3 finalized. Attached spreadsheet shows capacity by delivery point.

emails.subject: Agreement Amendment - 412
emails.body: Amendment to master agreement attached. Key changes highlighted in yellow for your review.

emails.subject: Please Review - 234
emails.body: Draft research report attached for your input. Please send comments by end of week.

emails.subject: Generation Outage Report - 867
emails.body: Unplanned outage at major California facility. Expected duration 48-72 hours. Market impact assessment underway.

emails.subject: Legal Opinion Request - 345
emails.body: Requesting legal opinion on proposed transaction structure. Time-sensitive - need response by Wednesday.

emails.subject: Follow Up - 178
emails.body: Following up on our discussion from Monday. Have you had a chance to review the proposal?

emails.subject: Market Intelligence - 723
emails.body: Competitor analysis update attached. Notable changes in market positioning observed in western region.

emails.subject: Policy Change Notice - 456
emails.body: Updated trading policy effective May 1st. All personnel must acknowledge receipt and understanding.

emails.subject: Reminder - 589
emails.body: Reminder: Performance reviews due by end of month. Please schedule meetings with direct reports.

emails.subject: Supply/Demand Analysis - 934
emails.body: Updated supply/demand forecast for Q4. Key assumptions and sensitivities detailed in report.

emails.subject: Audit Documentation - 267
emails.body: External audit begins September 1st. Please ensure all documentation is organized and accessible.

emails.subject: Status Report - 678
emails.body: Weekly status report attached. All major projects on track. One minor delay noted in IT systems upgrade.

emails.subject: Weather Impact Assessment - 145
emails.body: Winter weather forecast update. Above-normal temperatures expected through November. Reduced heating demand likely.

emails.subject: Terms and Conditions - 823
emails.body: Updated standard terms and conditions attached. Please use for all new customer agreements effective immediately.

emails.subject: Weekly Summary - 390
emails.body: Weekly highlights and achievements. Thank you all for your hard work this quarter.

emails.subject: Congestion Report - 512
emails.body: Significant congestion on Path 15 expected through end of month. Recommend adjusting positions accordingly.

emails.subject: Litigation Update - 678
emails.body: Status update on pending matters. Discovery deadline extended. Motion hearing scheduled for March.

emails.subject: Quick Question - 234
emails.body: Quick question about the pricing model. Can we discuss when you have a moment?

emails.subject: Power Price Volatility Analysis
emails.body: Quantitative analysis of recent price volatility attached. Recommend reviewing risk limits given current market conditions.

emails.subject: ISDA Master Agreement Review
emails.body: Standard ISDA negotiations proceeding. Key issues remain around credit support and termination events.

emails.subject: All Hands Meeting Announcement
emails.body: Please join us for the quarterly all-hands meeting next Thursday. State of the company presentation followed by Q&A.

emails.subject: Natural Gas Basis Differential
emails.body: Basis differential between Henry Hub and SoCal widening. Opportunity to capture spread through physical delivery.

emails.subject: Confidentiality Agreement
emails.body: NDA required for potential acquisition target. Please prepare standard confidentiality agreement for review.

metadata.description: Sample Enron email embeddings for demonstration
